@alwaysfullboost: Yes I have played the game. Did you ever hear of these things called demos? There was a demo for this game released last week.

If you want to play online then buy the game (like I do) but if you want to play single player then by all means pirate the game if you cant afford to buy it. They will still make a profit if the game is good.
There is no crack. Keep the iso mounted to play the game.
